process-def.name: :AutoPilot-OA-Change_Management:Utilities:Translate Field Values to Enumerated Values for Single Change

input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Example:BMC_ARS_System, HP_ServiceCenter

An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The change concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.

output.description: An XML document providing the data template for single change Concept element.The change concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.
An XML document providing detail failed change.

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: success, failure
String Value - A process specific string that explains the value of success status.

output.value: One or more mapping operations failed

input.value: Show contents of failed change collection

compensation.name: :AutoPilot-OA-Change_Management:Utilities:Translate Field Values to Enumerated Values for Single Change:999999999

documentation.description: This process will translate input field values to enumerated values using the module configuration mappings.

compensation-def.name: :AutoPilot-OA-Change_Management:Utilities:Translate Field Values to Enumerated Values for Single Change:999999999
